items.name: Greater Healing Potion
items.description: A potent potion that restores a significant amount of health.

items.name: Bear Hunter's Axe
items.description: A well-balanced axe designed specifically for fighting bears. The blade is inscribed with ancient runes.

items.name: Reinforced Leather Armor
items.description: Leather armor reinforced with metal plates for improved protection.

items.name: Crystal Amulet
items.description: An amulet with a blue crystal set in the center. It hums with strange energy.

items.name: Magic Crystal
items.description: A complete crystal that pulses with blue energy. It feels warm to the touch.
